noun.description: A thing given willingly to someone without payment; a present.

examples: he has a gift for comedy

verb.description: Give (something) as a gift, especially formally or as a donation or bequest.
examples: the company gifted 2,999 shares to a charity

phrases: they did not look the gift horse in the mouth when the opportunity for victory presented itself
Ah well, don't look a gift horse in the mouth, right?
I doubt whether there are any famous people or people of high standing living in the community, so don't look a gift horse in the mouth and grab this golden opportunity while it is still there.
